title: Does skipping ads when streaming a K-pop song on YouTube influence the view count? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ads on YouTube videos, as far as I know, are for rasing money. If a viewer watches an ad for longer than 30 seconds, then the artist / YouTuber gets a bit of money. I don’t think the ads influence the view count, streaming the MV doesn’t mean streaming every single part including the ads.
